title: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff: This isn't our first SaaSpocalypse
author: Julie Bort
content: Salesforce reported a solid year-end earnings and then pulled out all the stops to ward off more talk of the death of its business to AI.

aiAnalysis.summary: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff addresses concerns about AI threatening Salesforce's business model, emphasizing the company's resilience through previous tech transitions and its ongoing AI integration strategy.
keyPoints: Salesforce reports solid year-end earnings despite AI disruption fears
Benioff compares current AI shift to past 'SaaSpocalypses' the company survived
Company actively integrating AI agents into its CRM platform
Leadership remains confident in Salesforce's adaptability
